name: Binh Nguyen
tagline: Student at SOKENDAI (The University for Graduate Studies)
body:
### Educational background
* 2015 ~ present: Ph.D student, National Institute of Informatics (NII), Japan
* 2008: MSc in Computer Science, Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (JAIST), Japan
* 2003: BS in Computer Science, Hanoi University of Science and Technology (HUST), Vietnam
### Research interests
* Machine learning, data mining, recommender systems
* Analysis and mining of spatio-temporal data
### Publications
* Binh Nguyen, Kenro Aihara, Atsuhiro Takasu (2015), City recommender system based on a latent topic model, IEICE Tech. Rep., vol. 115, no. 381, AI2015-42, pp. 95-99, Dec. 2015
* Nguyen, T.B., Ho, T.B., Pham, C., Kawasaki, S. (2007), Matching Complex Documents Using Tolerance Rough Set Model, The 8th International Symposium on Knowledge and Systems Sciences KSS07, Ishikawa, Japan, Nov. 5-7, 156-162
### Interest conferences
* Machine Learning: NIPS, ICML, IROS, ACML
* Data Mining: ICDE, KDD, ICDM, CIKM, SDM, PKDD, WSDM, PAKDD
* Artificial intelligence: AAAI, IJCAI, ICRA, ICGA
* Recommender Systems: ACM RecSys
* Geographic information systems : SIGSPATIAL, COSIT, GIScience, ISPRS, GeoComputation, AGILE
### Links
* http://www.jmlr.org (JMLR: Journal of Machine Learning Research)
* http://www.kaggle.com (Competitions in data science)
* http://scikit-learn.org (scikit-learn: A machine learning toolkit in Python)
* http://rival.recommenders.net (RiVal: A toolkit for Recommender system evaluation)
* http://mahout.apache.org (Apache Mahout - Machine Learning, Recommender System framework)
* http://lenskit.org (LensKit: Open-Source Tools for Recommender Systems)
* http://mymedialite.net (MyMediaLite Recommender System Library)
* http://www.librec.net (LibRec: A Java Library for Recommender Systems)
* http://www.nervanasys.com/demystifying-deep-reinforcement-learning (Nevarna)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
